title: Bad Image

embed.description: Tinypic™ is a photo and video sharing service that allows you to easily upload, link and share your images and videos on MySpace®, eBay®, blogs and message boards. No account required, upload your photos and videos today!

body: Client worked fine yesterday. I woke up this morning and this is the only thing i get. Tried to reinstall but same thing. Anybody know what to do here?

replies.body: Thank you, It did indeed work but when I tried again this morning it happened again, Is there any type of more permanent solution or will I have to do this everyday? If i have to do this every morning so be it. But hopefully there is a permanent solution. Either way thanks for your assistance.

This can happen if your OS or antivirus settings have changed and blocking both game files from being accessed or updating correctly.  You'll want to start off with our [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to restore access.

Once completed, you might also need to complete a reinstall to make sure your new files install properly.  You can do this by using the [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to clean uninstall, double check to make sure your League folders are removed, then reinstall.  I hope that helps!
